DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess effect coronary artery plaque use aggressive lipid-lowering therapy versus moderate lipid-lowering therapy . A substudy examine effect treatments brachial artery vasoactivity .
DOC.brief_title: This Study Uses Ultrasound Determine Whether Atorvastatin Pravastatin Effects Progression Coronary Plaque .

LDL cholesterol equal 125mg/dl 210mg/dl . Patients anticipated undergo coronary bypass surgery cardiac transplantation course study .
